articles.title: Highly contagious COVID-19 variant found in Kent County - WILX-TV
articles.description: B117, which originated in the U.K., is concerning according to health experts, because it is 50 percent more transmissible, leading to faster spread of the virus and potentially increasing numbers of cases, hospitalizations, and deaths.
